"In Shah Mohammad Reza Pahlavi , all our investment in an individual, rather than in a country, came to naught," an American colonel named Colin Powell observed from the Pentagon. When the shah fell, our Shah Mohammad Reza Pahlavi policy fell with him. The hand we played in 1979 was self-nullifying, and helped usher in the Islamic Republic of Shah Mohammad Reza Pahlavi , which has vexed and weakened American policy for more than 30 years.
